DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterise the metabolism, excretion and pharmacokinetics of a single oral dose of [14C] AZD1236 in healthy male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion (ADME) and Pharmacokinetics (PK) Following a Single Oral Dose of AZD1236 in Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Nonsmokers Subjects who are exposed to radiation exposure as part of their occupation Subjects exposed to radiation levels above background of >5 mSv in last year, >10 mSv over last 5 years or a cumulative total of > 1 mSv per year of life A history or presence of conditions known to interfere with the absorption, distribution, metabolism or excretion for drugs eg. haematological, gastrointestinal, hepatic or renal disease etc
